intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Full-stack web developer and leader of my own development team, specializing in modern, fast, and conversion-optimized websites. We offer custom solutions, from landing pages to web applications. Portfolio, contact, and services all in one place.

daridevsTeam.achievements: Team Lead at my Web Development Agency, where we build scalable, tailor-made digital solutions.; Together with a team of professionals, I help businesses and entrepreneurs launch high-converting landing pages, user-friendly dashboards, modern blogs, reservation systems, e-commerce platforms, and all kinds of web applications.; We focus on real results: boosting your digital presence, attracting more clients, and helping you grow with technology that works for you.

fullStack.achievements: For 4 years, I’ve helped startups, local businesses, and companies build professional websites, online stores, and custom platforms.; I focused on delivering end-to-end solutions—from design to development—prioritizing speed, usability, and measurable results.; My work enabled clients to save time, increase traffic, and strengthen their online presence.

automation.achievements: I supported businesses and entrepreneurs by automating repetitive tasks and gathering valuable data from the web to drive better decision-making.; I built custom automation tools that saved time, minimized human errors, and optimized internal processes such as database updates, price monitoring, report generation, and lead tracking.
